verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:25
verses.text: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:26
verses.text: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:27
verses.text: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:28
verses.text: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:29
verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:30
verses.text: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
